title: Boarding Services
content:
#### Board includes:

- High-quality hay available at all times
- Personalized feeding program for your horse
- Daily turnout on pasture (summer months)
- Electrolytes and fly deterrent supplements
- Blanket, fly sheet, and fly mask changes

>**Veterinary & Farrier Services**

> Routine veterinary and farrier appointments are scheduled through GMF, with costs paid by the horse owner. *If you prefer your own vet or farrier* and cannot attend the appointment, a fee will apply for GMF staff to handle it on your behalf.

> **Additional Services**

> The following may incur extra fees:
> - Additional supplements
> - Specialized medical care (e.g., daily abscess treatment)
> - Equine bodywork coordination:
>   - Chiropractors
>   - Massage therapists
>   - Magna Wave practitioners

> *Owners are welcome to include their horses in bodywork sessions at their own expense.*

title: Full Time Training
content:
#### Full Training includes:

> Four professional rides or private sessions per week, totaling 16 sessions per month. Additional lunging sessions are available at $35 each. Extra rides or lessons beyond the included 16 can be arranged, with pricing determined based on the type of session.

> **Access to private GMF farm events**
> - Dressage training days
> - Show jumping
> - Free jumping
> - Cross-country schooling
> - Trail rides

> *If an outside clinician is brought in for feedback during these events, an additional fee may apply.*

title: Part Time Training
content:
#### Partial Training Program includes:

> One professional ride and two group lessons per week, for a total of 12 sessions per month. Additional lunging sessions are available at $35 each. Extra rides or private lessons can be arranged, with pricing based on the type of session and agreed upon with GMF staff.

> **Access to private GMF farm events**
> - Dressage training days
> - Show jumping
> - Free jumping
> - Cross-country schooling
> - Trail rides.

> *If an outside clinician is brought in for feedback during these events, an additional fee may apply.*

title: Leasing
content:
#### Leasing Program

> GMF offers a limited number of horses available for lease.

>   *At this time, we offer half leases on our GMF owned horses. (see below)* 

>   - Lessees are responsible for 50% of veterinary and farrier costs, as well as half the cost of bodywork and grooming services such as clipping, mane pulling, and show braiding.

>  - Lunging sessions are included in the lease.

title: Half Leasing
amount: $450 total per month ($200 board plus $250 per month lesson program)
content:
#### Half Lease includes:

> Two group lessons per week (8 per month) and one free ride per week.

> - Free rides may be used for trail rides, off-site shows, or GMF private weekend events such as dressage training days, show jumping, free jumping, cross-country schooling, or professional clinics.

> - An additional fee may apply if a clinician is brought in for feedback during these events.

> - Lunging sessions are included.

title: Lesson Program
amount: Lesson amounts depend on which type of lesson, please see below
content:
#### Lesson program includes:
